projects.name: Exploratory Data Analysis on Retail Data with Python
projects.description: Conducted thorough data analysis to extract insights into sales patterns and top-selling products. Utilized Python libraries such as Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn. Performed data cleaning, handled missing values, and conducted RFM (Recency, Frequency, Monetary) analysis to understand insights for business improvement.

projects.name: Product Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed a product recommendation system using collaborative filtering and Singular Value Decomposition to provide personalized product suggestions based on user ratings. Implemented data preprocessing, EDA, and model evaluation to ensure high accuracy and improved user experience.

projects.name: Data Visualization through Power BI
projects.description: Conducted a comprehensive analysis of over 80,000 rows of sales data using Power BI. Addressed missing values and data inconsistencies to ensure data integrity. Utilized bar charts and pie charts to analyze revenue, sales trends, and identify top-performing products and markets.

experiences.description: Completed a simulation focused on advising a hypothetical social media client as a Data Analyst at Accenture. Cleaned, modeled, and analyzed 7 datasets to uncover insights into content trends to inform strategic decisions. Prepared a PowerPoint deck and video presentation to communicate key insights for the client and internal stakeholders.
